title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
Title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Indoor Garden with 25W Full-Spectrum SMD LED Grow Light, 4L Tank, Quiet Auto-Circulation, Height-Adjustable, Plant Food Included

Key Features:
- Faster, healthier growth: 25W full-spectrum SMD LED grow light delivers 30% more luminous flux than traditional LEDs and accelerates plant growth up to 5x for year-round herbs, veggies, and flowers.
- Smart water circulation: Advanced Deep Flow technique automatically cycles every 30 minutes to oxygenate roots and keep water fresh, with a low-noise pump for quiet operation.
- Large 4L water tank: Supports up to 18 days of self-sufficient growth with a clear water level gauge and ample root space for stronger plants.
- 12-pod capacity: Grow a generous variety of plants at once—basil, lettuce, cherry tomatoes, mint, strawberries, flowers, and more.
- Height-adjustable grow deck: Extendable rod adjusts up to 17.78 inches to accommodate plants as they mature for optimal light coverage.
- Simple, guided setup: Built-in timer and intuitive operation make indoor gardening easy for beginners and efficient for pros.

Why You’ll Love It:
- Fresh, pesticide-free produce at home, any season.
- Balanced, full-spectrum lighting ensures robust growth from seedling to harvest.
- Quiet, automated water flow minimizes maintenance while maximizing oxygen to roots.
- Spacious tank and 12 pods mean more harvest with less refilling.

What’s in the Box:
- Hydroponics growing system x1
- Plant food A & B (nutrients) x1 set
- Planting hats x12
- Planting baskets x12
- Biochar mud (growing sponges) x12
- Power adapter x1
- User manual x1

Specifications:
- Light: 25W SMD LED, full-spectrum
- Growth boost: Up to 5x faster versus soil under similar conditions
- Water system: Advanced Deep Flow, auto cycle every 30 minutes, low-noise pump
- Tank capacity: 4L with water level gauge
- Height adjustment: Up to 17.78 inches
- Pods: 12
- Timer: Built-in
- Warranty: 360-day warranty; after-sales support available

Perfect For:
- Kitchen counters, apartments, dorms, and offices
- Beginners to seasoned growers wanting low-maintenance, high-yield indoor gardening
- Fresh herbs, leafy greens, microgreens, small fruits, and ornamentals

Grow smarter, cleaner, and faster—bring a thriving indoor garden to your countertop with this 12-pod hydroponic system and enjoy fresh harvests in weeks, not months.
